SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id AND s.store_id = i.store_id LEFT JOIN safe sa ON sa.stock_id = s.stock_id
i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.del_yn = b'0'
AND s.favorite_yn = 1
AND s.quantity < sa.safe_quantity
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM request r WHERE r.stock_id = s.stock_id AND r.del_yn = b'0' AND (r.request_status IS NULL OR r.request_status NOT IN ('취소','완료')) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(h.created_at) AS last_inout FROM stock_history h WHERE h.stock_id = s.stock_id AND h.his_type IN ('IN','OUT') ) t WHERE t.last_inout < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, i.item_name AS itemName, s.stock_id as stockId, s.quantity AS quantity, s.favorite_yn AS favoriteYn, im.path AS imageUrl FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id AND s.store_id = i.store_id LEFT JOIN image im ON im.image_id = i.image_id AND im.is_active = b'1' LEFT JOIN safe sa ON sa.stock_id = s.stock_id
i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.del_yn = b'0'
AND s.favorite_yn = 1
AND s.quantity < sa.safe_quantity
AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM request r WHERE r.stock_id = s.stock_id AND r.del_yn = b'0' AND (r.request_status IS NULL OR r.request_status NOT IN ('취소','완료')) )
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(h.created_at) AS last_inout FROM stock_history h WHERE h.stock_id = s.stock_id AND h.his_type IN ('IN','OUT') ) t WHERE t.last_inout < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) )
AND i.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY i.item_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.item_id AS itemId, s.stock_id AS stockId, i.item_name AS itemName, s.quantity AS quantity, s.favorite_yn AS favoriteYn, im.path AS imageUrl, sa.safe_quantity AS safeQuantity, sh.his_type AS lastHisType, sh.created_at AS lastHis
FROM item i JOIN stock s ON s.item_id = i.item_id AND s.store_id = i.store_id
LEFT JOIN safe sa ON sa.stock_id = s.stock_id
LEFT JOIN image im ON im.image_id = i.image_id AND im.is_active = b'1'
LEFT JOIN stock_history sh ON sh.history_id = ( SELECT MAX(h2.history_id) FROM stock_history h2 WHERE h2.stock_id = s.stock_id ) WHERE i.store_id = #{storeId} AND i.item_id = #{itemId} AND i.del_yn = b'0'
